overview:
Senior-level technology executive.

Track record of building large-scale Consumer Portals with millions of visitors per month generating real cash-flow. Works under the motto that business should never be complicated. Make things simpler for Users, treat everyone fairly, adapt your tactics and never give up.

Currently working as GM of ShopaService Inc. Co-founded the company in 2008 to offer a realtime transactions-based platform to shop for different types of services on the internet. Over two-third of US GDP is now dependent on ‘Services’. The market is now in dire need of an online platform that creates value for it’s users as well as service providers by creating a network effect of online transactions.

Remember what Expedia did to ‘Travel’, EBay did to ‘Auction’, Amazon did to ‘Retail’, Google did to ‘Search’, Microsoft did to ‘Software’, and Monster did to ‘Jobs’. That’s what ShopaService is doing to ‘Services’. Simple concept with a Sophisticated base.
